<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/scorecards"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch all scorecards in your Port organization.<br/><br/>To learn more about scorecards, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/promote-scorecards/).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

</StatusCodes>
